day 1.notes: Maintain a controlled tempo of 3-1-1-0 for all exercises. Ensure proper form to prevent injury.
day 1.explanations: Selected Flat DB Press to target the chest without overhead pressing, Seated Lat Bar Row for balanced back development, BB Bicep Curl and Cable Rope Pushdowns to focus on arm muscles, and Plank to engage the core. Exercises avoid overhead movements to comply with user limitations.

day 3.notes: Focus on controlled movements with a tempo of 3-1-1-0. Engage core throughout the workout.
day 3.explanations: Incline DB Press emphasizes the upper chest, Plate Loaded Low Row ensures comprehensive back engagement, Hammer Curls target the brachialis for arm thickness, Cable V-Grip Pushdowns focus on the triceps, and Plank strengthens the core. All exercises are selected to avoid overhead pressing.

day 6.notes: Use a controlled tempo of 3-1-1-0 for all exercises. Focus on breathing and form.
day 6.explanations: Flat Smith Machine Press targets the mid chest without requiring overhead movement, Single Arm DB Row ensures balanced back development, Standing Bar Cable Curls engage all bicep heads, Machine Tricep Pushdowns effectively isolate the triceps, and Plank maintains core strength. All exercises adhere to the user's limitation against overhead pressing.
